title: You Could Have Been A Contender
itunes:title: You Could Have Been A Contender
description:
If you follow The Cigar Authority, you already know who the contenders are for the upcoming 2016 Cigar of the Year… But today, we will be talking about some honorable mentions that didn’t make the cut for one reason or another. In the first hour, we spark up a Serino Royale XX Maduro…

Today we go around the table and name off some of our favorite cigars that could have been a contender if it wasn’t for the FDA. We also let you know how you can sign up for the next release of our CARE PACKAGE program. You won’t want to miss it! Join us LIVE from 12-2pm for the insanity that is… THE CIGAR AUTHORITY!
